original_text: Who gave Jacob for a spoil, and Israel to the robbers? did not the Lord, he against whom we have sinned? for they would not walk in his ways, neither were they obedient unto his law.
korean_text: 야곱이 탈취를 당하게 하신 자가 누구냐 이스라엘을 약탈자들에게 넘기신 자가 누구냐 여호와가 아니시냐 우리가 그에게 범죄하였도다 그들이 그의 길로 다니기를 원하지 아니하며 그의 교훈을 순종하지 아니하였도다

sentences.original_text: Who gave Jacob for a spoil
he against whom we have sinned?
for they would not walk in his ways
neither were they obedient unto his law.
